title: Why was this deleted?
body:
Content Deleted:

"doesnt actually respond to anything he disagrees with with an actual argument. just the usual irrelevant drivel from this person."




but you allow the sarcastic nonconstructive comment from said person in response to proper criticism and discussion that i was referring to. not to mention the constant "but you're bronze trash" posts from the same person. (not saying you should actually delete his comments but you're obviously taking sides here when you're meant to be neutral and objective)

all that was made is an observation and is 100% the truth. you can't go deleting things that are inconvenient for you and/or people you are siding with. this just further proves my point made in that thread.

replies.body:
The mods haven't had any clue what they are doing for a while.

EDIT: Some of the ones i had deleted.

"This logic though.

It's not just "this system or nothing" but hey let's keep pretending."

"How about you just don't tell people your autistic then?

That fixes the issue.

EDIT: This is the same as the whole "i'm a girl people are mean to me" argument, you are just invited people to be dicks, not actually doing anything productive.

This is the internet, we are all anonymous, no one gives a fuck if your 12 or if your a 40 year old virgin in your mothers basement, because they are both the same to us, and we will treat you how we treat you regardless, you are just handing us a target."

(I'm really not sure why this one was deleted, it's stating facts.)

And my personal fav.

"I like how instead of helping this guy (OP) and telling him to submit a ticket, you instead focus on continuing an argument with someone else.

10/10 volunteer work"

By this standard, our mods need to be removing a hell of a lot more then they are.

Of course the mods are biased, whenever a post is made which is against something Riot has done there is ALWAYS a moderator commenting on it, and they are always writing their heart out in order to prove the person wrong. Because there obviously can't be any constructive criticism with such a PERFECT game as League of Legends. There can't be anything wrong with it, all these people complaining are obviously mislead and are overreacting. Well damn, that's A LOT of people who are "overreacting".

To be fair the greater majority of complaint threads are nothing more than shit flinging and whinging and can in no way be taken as constructive criticism.

I'll see maybe 1 in every 20 actually be a properly typed out and thought out complaint/criticism on a change to the game, while the other 19 are effectively "HURRRRR TAKING SIGHTSTONE OUT OF GAME RETARDED CHANGE STOP BEING SHIT RITO".

well my comment that was deleted is essentially what you're saying now. this person doesn't actually respond to anything in a properly typed and thought out way. he responds with 'shit flinging' and in some cases, personal insults. in literally every thread he responds to.

yet pointing that out is a delete worthy 'offense', while his 'shit flinging' is allowed?

i guess your comment should be deleted too?

>HURRRRR TAKING SIGHTSTONE OUT OF GAME RETARDED CHANGE STOP BEING SHIT RITO

To be fair, that is still kinda a legit complaint, whether you like it or not.

That said even if the main post isn't well typed out, there are usually at least a few well typed out replies.
Broken Scripts has a broken mentality, I fart in your general direction (that's a certain British comedy troupe, you may know them).
Drama on oce boards lol. Guys why even bother.

Jason, from that same thread involving autism comments, I had a comment deleted that included the same content as another post I had made, that was allowed.

> Don't Be a Jerk
> I left your other comment up because frankly it was funny and it was rather apt as well, and making light of an illness can be a good way not to let it stress you out. But, then comes the whole keep it to your friends argument. As a vague statement or referring to someone you know no problem, but aiming it at a stranger (and a volatile one at that) is no bueno. Let's not start any more fights than there already are ey?
> 
> Comment Deleted:
> *Assburgers

Confirmed: OCE board mods are on crack.

> [{quoted}](name=QAPLA,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=MAqVkEdh,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2018-01-15T23:15:51.453+0000)
>
> Jason, from that same thread involving autism comments, I had a comment deleted that included the same content as another post I had made, that was allowed.
> 
> Confirmed: OCE board mods are on crack.

"making light of an illness can be a good way not to let it stress you out."

My God, that is the most backwards logic I have ever heard. As someone with autism, all the idiots labelling it the same thing as being 'slow' is very insulting. It's the same with depression. The whole, "I'm just gonna kill myself" does nothing to help with the 'illness', which neither depression nor autism are.

However, what you posted deserved to be deleted tbh. That's not funny.

> [{quoted}](name=Broken Scripts,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=MAqVkEdh,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2018-01-16T01:54:35.401+0000)
>

> 
> My God, that is the most backwards logic I have ever heard. As someone with autism, all the idiots labelling it the same thing as being 'slow' is very insulting. It's the same with depression. The whole, "I'm just gonna kill myself" does nothing to help with the 'illness', which neither depression nor autism are.
> 
> However, what you posted deserved to be deleted tbh. That's not funny.

Okay bro, I'm on meds for anxiety/depression, I dgaf what anyone says about my condition, and you know how many times I've brought it up in-game, zero.

Take a reality check.

Oh if we are going into that we have to go into what i'm being told with the report of my comment being deleted.

https://image.prntscr.com/image/QkiSkd6tSUO602l4DKWq7g.png

The mod called me an arsehat and hurt my feelings.

Like how is it that in the same thing where all those comments got banned, i have a personal attack being shown to me?

The only one of mine that got removed that could be considered personal attack is the one where i call out Sera's for continuing an argument instead of being productive.

(Or the one where i said Sera's would be no fun at comedy shows, but hey you know criticising People not doing their job isn't allowed.)
